title: Soap's Journal.pdf
description: Soap's Journal is a book included in the Call of Duty: Modern Warfare 3's Hardened edition. It is written from Captain John "Soap" MacTavish point of view and details events from before the start of Call of Duty 4: Modern Warfare all the way up to "Blood Brothers" in Call of Duty: Modern Warfare 3. Price can be seen taking the journal from Soap's pocket in "Blood Brothers" before Yuri has his flashback.
